ONLY SCHOOL FACILITY IMPROVEMENTS. Did you know that revenue from the community-recommended sales tax to update Richland County High School could only be used for school facility improvements? Many essential items would not be subject to the tax ... things such as groceries, drugs (including prescription medications, vitamins, and over the counter medication) farm equipment (including fertilizer and seed), mobile homes and licensed and titled vehicles or boats and RVs. It doesn’t tax anything that is not currently taxed.

Learn more about the smart improvement plan for our high school at www.rccu1.net, then cast your vote on Tuesday, March 20.
